title: Hook
description: Falling in love is supposed to be the easy part.But nothing prepared me for losing my wife. I promised her that I'd love again. Find someone to mend my broken heart. And that seems impossible, until the day that I walk into Tilly Carter's cupcake shop.I've never met a woman like her--sassy, dirty-mouthed, and smells like vanilla and sin. Someone that makes me want to sweep her off her feet.But there's pain in her emerald eyes that mirrors mine. A past that neither of us can truly escape.Now that I have her, I'll do anything to keep her.Hook is the third book in the USA Today bestselling Men of Inked: Southside series. Book 1 - Maneuver Book 2 - Flow Book 3 - Hook Book 4 - Hustle
author: Chelle Bliss
